fixes.name: MTD Value - YoY
fixes.dax_expression: ('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[MTD Value] - 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[MTD Value - Last Year]) / 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[MTD Value - Last Year]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau formula to DAX by referencing the pre-existing calculated measures in the 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)' table using the table[column] format and preserving the original arithmetic ((MTD Value - MTD Value - Last Year) / MTD Value - Last Year).
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references aggregated/calculated measures (MTD Value and MTD Value - Last Year), so it must be implemented as a measure.
